title: Supervisors: Managing a Supervisor
body:
Supervisors: Managing a Supervisor¶


  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click Team

  3. Click Supervisors

  4. Click a supervisor to view their profile and a list of their employees

  5. Click Manage Employees or and Manage Employees

  6. Select a user from the displayed users or find a user using the search feature

    • Click a user to make it an employee of the supervisor

    • Click to remove a user from the supervisor’s list of employees

  7. Click Save
toc: • Supervisors: Managing a Supervisor
